meanings.definition: A type of shrub with fragrant white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The philadelphuses in the garden smell lovely.
meanings.sent2: I planted some philadelphuses in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The bees love buzzing around the philadelphuses.
meanings.sent4: The philadelphuses stood out like stars in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the philadelphuses danced in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: There are many philadelphuses in bloom this season.
meanings.sent2: The garden is filled with beautiful philadelphuses.
meanings.sent3: The philadelphuses gathered for a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The philadelphuses whispered stories to each other.
meanings.sent5: The philadelphuses swayed gently in the wind.
